tasks.prompt: Complete the registration process using username:newuser<web_agent_id>, email:newuser<web_agent_id>@gmail.com, and password:password123

tests.description: Check if specific event was triggered
tests.reasoning: This test ensures that the registration event is triggered with the specific username format required by the task, confirming that the registration process is completed using the correct username.

use_case.name: User Registration
use_case.description: The user fills out the registration form and successfully creates a new account.

examples.prompt: Register with the following username:<username>,email:<email> and password:<password>

test.reasoning: This test applies when the task requires a registration event with a specific username.

tasks.prompt: Enter the website using the login form with username:user<web_agent_id> and password:password123

tests.description: Check if specific event was triggered
tests.reasoning: This test is necessary to verify that the agent successfully logs into the website using the specified username format. The correct triggering of a LOGIN event with the expected username confirms the task's completion.

test.reasoning: This test applies when the task requires a login event.
